title: Coinbase exec leaving to lead marketing and sales at Fidelity Digital Assets
content: Another Coinbase exec has surrendered to the company's divide over institutional uptake.
Christine Sandler will be leaving her role at the firm to join Fidelity to play a key role in its crypto custody business as head of marketing and sales, sources confirmed.
